title: Understanding Encryption
text: Encryption is a method of converting data into a code to prevent unauthorized access. It ensures that only authorized parties can read the data.

title: Common Encryption Methods
text: Some common encryption methods include AES, RSA, and DES. Each has its own strengths and use cases.

title: Choosing the Right Method
text: AES is a widely used encryption standard known for its speed and security. It is often used to secure sensitive data.
